item.description:
From the press release: "Calling all local food lovers! One week from today, you could be at Vital Communities' 12th Annual Flavors of the Valley. This local tasting expo will take place Sunday, April 14 from 11-3 at Hartford High School. Join over 50 farm, restaurant, business and nonprofit vendors sampling the best food our region has to offer. Celebrate local agriculture with artisan cheese, fresh bread, homemade chocolate, BBQ chicken, pulled pork, swedish meatballs, fresh produce and much more! Tickets are $8 at the door, $25 for families. Children 6 and under, free."
http://www.vitalcommunities.org/Agriculture/flavors/

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Vital Communities' 12th Annual Flavors of the Valley
